headline: PPG, PPG Foundation invested $18.1 million in communities worldwide in 2025
summary: PITTSBURGH, February 19, 2026--PPG (NYSE:PPG) and the PPG Foundation today announced an investment of $18.1 million in communities worldwide in 2025. The 2025 funding supported more than 400 community partners and programs that focus on advancing education, delivering community sustainability and encouraging PPG employee volunteerism.

content.title: PPG, PPG Foundation invested $18.1 million in communities worldwide in 2025
content.summary: PITTSBURGH, February 19, 2026--PPG (NYSE:PPG) and the PPG Foundation today announced an investment of $18.1 million in communities worldwide in 2025. The 2025 funding supported more than 400 community partners and programs that focus on advancing education, delivering community sustainability and encouraging PPG employee volunteerism.

thumbnail.caption: PPG and the PPG Foundation invested $18.1 million in communities worldwide in 2025, supporting more than 400 community partners and programs in around 30 countries.
